data.message: ....to the powers that be, at Facebook:  Please.  We do not have to see each and every post that our friends "like"!!!!!  It is ridiculous  to have all of those "liked" posts, photos and such fill the newsfeed.   Please.  All that is needed in the newsfeed is what is truly current.  New updates, photos, etc.   I don't care what my friends are "liking".

replies.message: Hello Teresa. You can adjust what you see in your News Feed by following or unfollowing friends, adding people to your friends lists, hiding stories you don't want to see, and choosing to view stories in the order they were posted. Learn how at: http://on.fb.me/WkjYsa. -Sarah
Please Read My Mesage In  Inbox
